main_definition: Consumers are individuals or groups who purchase goods and services for personal use or consumption.

meanings_and_examples.example: In a retail setting, consumers browse through products to make purchases.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Entities that use or purchase services
meanings_and_examples.example: Companies act as consumers when they subscribe to cloud computing services for their business operations.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Organizations responsible for the consumption of natural resources
meanings_and_examples.example: Government agencies serve as consumers of water and energy, managing these resources on behalf of citizens.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In ecology, organisms that consume other organisms or organic matter for energy
meanings_and_examples.example: Lions are considered consumers in an African savanna food chain as they hunt and eat prey animals.
